Really passive. Really passive. We don't play like that.
translation.ko: 정말 수동적이었죠, 정말로요 보통 그렇게 안 하거든요

translation.en: [Toby] Puppey and Dendi just wanna retreat back out.
820! What a Fissure!
PLT is there! Echo Slam as well!
translation.ko: PLT도 거기 있죠! 지진파 공명도 터집니다!

translation.en: Beautiful play there by EHOME.
But I know if I die, I die not for nothing.
translation.ko: 하지만 제가 죽는다면 그냥 죽을 순 없죠

translation.en: [Toby] X!! in the middle lane…
Force, Rocket, Laser. It's enough!
translation.ko: 염동력 지팡이에 조명탄 레이저까지 들어가네요 충분합니다!

translation.en: Dendi goes down in the middle lane. Again, EHOME controls…
Sometimes, it can be like, you dying, but your teammates picking up more.
translation.ko: 가끔은 그래요 저는 죽어도 다른 팀원들이 더 많이 얻어내는 거죠

translation.en: [Toby] EHOME, they still wanna push out that mid…
translation.ko: EHOME이 중부 전선을 더 밀려나 봅니다

translation.en: [Clement] They weren't ready for Dendi Enigma.
translation.ko: Dendi의 에니그마를 예상 못 했던 거예요

translation.en: It was a patient Enigma.
That was the most patient Enigma in the world.
translation.ko: 그만한 인내의 에니그마는 세상에 둘도 없죠

translation.en: [Toby] Dendi as well. Gonna look for the Hole.
Black Hole!
Three are gonna go down for EHOME.
Currently, Na'Vi, they, they have the advantage now.
[Clement] That really impresses me how he's able to make that transition.
translation.ko: Dendi가 어떻게 그렇게 변하는지 놀라울 뿐이에요

translation.en: You just have to have the balls, basically.
translation.ko: 그냥 깡이 엄청나게 세야 하는 거겠죠

translation.en: He was scared of losing.
That's why he's so patient and he did everything right.
translation.ko: 그래서 끈기 있게 기다렸다 제대로 해낸 거죠

translation.en: [Fear] Their strategy is kind of similar to how EHOME won.
translation.ko: EHOME이 이겼을 때 쓴 것과 비슷한 전략을 썼죠

translation.en: [Liu] Na'Vi defeated them "Late Game."
And I think this really shattered EHOME's confidence.
[Toby] And "GG" is the call from EHOME. Na'Vi, they take the game.
translation.ko: EHOME의 GG입니다 Na'Vi가 이 경기를 가져갑니다

translation.en: And they are only one win short of taking home one million dollars.
[Liu] We hardly won the second game.
Chinese teams generally are feared for their "Late Game" potential.
[Toby] So we hit the point now. The gloves come off.
translation.ko: 이제 시간이 됐습니다 본격적인 경기가 시작됩니다

translation.en: EHOME, they will master their knowledge, their experience,
translation.ko: EHOME이 Na'Vi를 상대로 그간 쌓은 지식, 경험과

translation.en: their calls up against Na'Vi.
translation.ko: EHOME이 Na'Vi를 상대로 그간 쌓은 지식, 경험과 모든 판단력을 발휘하겠네요

translation.en: And Puck will be the last hero for Na'Vi. The nimble hero there already.
translation.ko: Na'Vi가 마지막으로 퍽을 선택합니다 재빠르게 움직이는 영웅이죠

translation.en: Once again a lot of aggressive heroes for them.
translation.ko: 다시 한번 공격적인 영웅을 많이 선택했습니다

translation.en: Na'Vi LighTofHeaveN playing as the Beastmaster again
with Dendi playing as the Puck this time.
If Na'Vi wins this, they win the whole tournament.
translation.ko: 이번 경기에서 Na'Vi가 이기면 최종 우승을 차지합니다

translation.en: This Clash of the Titans right here is something we will not wanna miss.
translation.ko: 이 거물들의 싸움은 한순간도 놓칠 수 없죠

translation.en: X!! will come in closer. They will be able to get that kill.
Doom now on Dendi. Pulled in by X!!
translation.ko: Dendi에게 파멸이 걸렸네요 X!!가 당겨오고 EHOME 팀 모두 붙었네요

translation.en: The entire EHOME team turns on him.
translation.ko: X!!가 당겨오고 EHOME 팀 모두 붙었네요

translation.en: Lich will go down.
FCB is on the run. XBOCT after the chase of him.
Might be enough. Needs some more damage. Storm! X!! Long jump in.
translation.ko: 더 공격하려나 봅니다 폭풍령, X!!입니다! 멀리서 뛰어 들어왔어요

translation.en: Dendi Orbing up to the high ground. FCB! Puts on the Rift.
translation.ko: Dendi가 높은 지대로 신비로운 구슬을 보냅니다 균열 메우기에 FCB가 걸렸습니다!

translation.en: Will he be able to get the kill? He's on the retreat.
Yes, it is. Dendi with the last right click.
EHOME now, they're gonna rotate themselves down.
Na'Vi already in the pit.
They're trying to bring down Roshan, all 5.
translation.ko: 다섯 명이 다 같이 로샨을 처리하려는군요

translation.en: Dendi! He's gonna jump out! He goes for the Dream Coil! He gets them!
He gets EHOME! Holds them in the middle lane.
Na'Vi already on their way out of the pit.
translation.ko: Na'Vi는 이미 전부 밖으로 나오는 중입니다

translation.en: They're coming in to help out Dendi.
[Clement] Then we just went in and demolished them.
[Toby] Now they're on top of the Tier 3 tower.
They're gonna bring it down. Yes, it does! It goes down!
EHOME, they're trying desperately to defend,
but Na'Vi, the onslaught will continue.
The mid tower's already being pushed. The Tier 4 tower is gonna go down.
translation.ko: 중부 포탑은 벌써 밀리고 있고 4차 포탑도 무너지려 합니다

translation.en: And running in right now is the rest of Na'Vi.
They are running forward to one million dollars.
And they will get it! The "GG" is the call from EHOME.
Na'Vi have just won one million dollars.
translation.ko: Na'Vi가 방금 백만 달러를 손에 넣었습니다

translation.en: EHOME do take home 250,000 dollars in second place.
But Na'Vi are the champions!
There's moments of E-Sports that are landmark,
and this is one of them, in Cologne.
translation.ko: 오늘 바로 여기 쾰른에서 그런 순간이 탄생했습니다

translation.en: And Na'Vi, the winners. You guys have just made history.
[Katya] I was jumping on the sofa.
And screaming like a crazy girl,
because I was the happiest girl in the world.
translation.ko: 그 순간엔 세상에서 제일 행복한 사람이었죠

translation.en: And my brother just won one million dollars!
translation.ko: 내 동생이 방금 백만 달러를 땄으니까요

translation.en: I think in ten years' time
all the gamers which we currently have showing themselves,
they're gonna be the guys we'll look back at
and say, "This was the beginning, this is where it all started."
translation.ko: 이 사람들이 모든 것의 시작점이었다고 하겠죠

translation.en: These are the guys that worked hard and they took the risk.
translation.ko: 이 선수들이 열심히 노력하고 위험을 무릅쓰면서까지

translation.en: They proved themselves.
And they forwarded the entire industry
to the point where we could have a kick-start.
translation.ko: 이 분야를 여기까지 이끌어 왔기에 게이머가 될 수 있었고 세상에 보여 줄 수 있다고요

translation.en: We could show the world what we do.
translation.ko: 게이머가 될 수 있었고 세상에 보여 줄 수 있다고요

translation.en: And then who knows how big we could get at that point.
translation.ko: 그쯤 되면 우리가 얼마나 커 있을지 누가 알겠어요 "상금 백만 달러"

translation.en: We've come far already.
When more and more people support it and it becomes more and more normal,
translation.ko: 더 많은 지지를 받고 더 평범한 직업으로 여겨진다면

translation.en: it's going to go from a niche to becoming accepted in societies.
translation.ko: 작은 틈새에서 시작했지만 사회가 인정하는 일이 되겠죠

translation.en: I think in 15 years, E-Sports will be bigger than football.
translation.ko: 15년 후에는 미식축구보다 e스포츠가 더 커질 거예요

translation.en: Than basketball, than everything.
That kid who you thought played too many video games
is potentially going to be on a path where he's earning 250,000 a year, salary.
translation.ko: 연봉 25만 달러를 벌 수도 있는 그런 날이 올 거예요

translation.en: He's flying the world. He's gonna be endorsed.
translation.ko: 전 세계를 날아다니며 열띤 지지를 받겠죠

translation.en: Gaming's the biggest entertainment industry in the world.
translation.ko: 게임은 세상에서 가장 큰 엔터테인먼트 산업이에요

translation.en: So if you're a star,
you are potentially one of the biggest stars in the world.
translation.ko: 세상에서 가장 유명한 사람이 되는 셈이죠

translation.en: So, if that, like everything else with computers grows exponentially
translation.ko: 컴퓨터에 관련된 건 모두 엄청 빠르게 발전하니까

translation.en: or whatever, then 5 or 10 years could be a big step actually.
[Tammy] Changing mindsets is never easy.
translation.ko: 사고방식을 바꾸는 것은 쉬운 일이 아니죠

translation.en: So it's gonna take a while.
When the gamers now become parents,
translation.ko: 지금 게임하는 사람들이 부모가 된 다음에는

translation.en: we will be supportive of our kids playing,
and I think that's really when everything will boom.
translation.ko: 그땐 모든 게 폭발적인 반응을 일으킬 거예요

translation.en: [newscaster] After weeks of training,
translation.ko: 이 지역 출신으로 단 몇 주 만의 연습 후

translation.en: a local man has led his online gaming team to the top,
translation.ko: 이 지역 출신으로 단 몇 주 만의 연습 후 독일에서 열린 국제 게임 대회에서

translation.en: placing seventh in an international gaming competition held in Germany.
Yeah, she's definitely proud of me. I mean, just, she had her camera out,
translation.ko: 어머니께서 당연히 자랑스러워하시죠 사진기를 꺼내 들고는…

translation.en: like, "Why are taking a photo of the television?"
[Fear] I know she's really smart. She's a lawyer, so…
But in the end, I think she'll be more understanding
and be willing to support me more,
so it worked out.
[hyhy] We were disappointed with our loss.
And, yeah, it's a mixture of both, we're happy and sad that we got third.
translation.ko: 패배한 건 실망스러웠죠 복잡한 심경이랄까 3위라서 기쁘면서도 슬펐어요

translation.en: Because of the emotions, I felt like she's the one I wanted to share them with.
translation.ko: 북받쳐 오르는 감정을 나누고 싶은 사람은 바로 전 여자 친구였어요

translation.en: And it got pretty clear only then that I had to get her back.
translation.ko: 그쯤 되니까 어떻게든 다시 만나야겠다고 확신했죠

translation.en: After the tournament, I actually went back to look for her,
and talk things out, and we have actually begun dating again.
translation.ko: 이런저런 얘기를 했고 지금은 다시 만나요

translation.en: And things are actually going great.
I love her, you know. [chuckles]
[hyhy] She played a huge role, a very huge part
in… in the me today.
[Dendi] One week ago, it was 3,000 followers. I was happy.
Then it's boomed. 8,000 followers.
It's not about the number.
Even if it's one or two, I'm fine.
So… you don't need to show numbers actually. I think.
translation.ko: 그러니까 숫자는 볼 필요가 없다고 생각해요

translation.en: [Katya] My father, I think,
didn't have time to understand what Dendi's doing.
We lost him too early.
And if now he could see Dendi,
I'm sure that he's proud of his son.
